# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="237ee-102">Записване на съобщенията в Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="237ee-103">Не можете да запишете имейл съобщения в Outlook.com, но можете да ги отпечатате на PDF, които можете да запишете на вашия компютър.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="237ee-104">Microsoft печат към PDF полезност, включени в Windows 10 ви позволява да отпечатате всяко имейл съобщение директно към PDF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="237ee-105">Изберете съобщението, което искате да запишете.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="237ee-106">Изберете трите точки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="237ee-107">в горната част на съобщението и след това изберете</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="237ee-108">**Печат**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="237ee-109">Изберете **печат** отново и от принтера падащото меню, изберете **Microsoft печат към PDF**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="237ee-110">Изберете **печат**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="237ee-111">Въведете име на файла, след което изберете **Запиши**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="237ee-112">**Забележка:** Това не се препоръчва на споделен или обществен сметачна машина, тъй като други потребители може да имат достъп до всички PDF файлове можете да запишете на Компютъра и не изтривайте.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="237ee-113">За повече информация за отпечатване вижте [печат имейл съобщения, прикачени файлове и календари в Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="237ee-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
